summary: Defines a deep graph convolutional network model that stacks multiple graph convolution layers with residual connections, message normalization, dropout, and configurable softmax-based aggregation, optionally learning an inverse temperature parameter for graph representation learning.
business_intent: Enable researchers and practitioners to train highâ€‘performance graph neural networks for tasks such as molecular property prediction or graph classification, leveraging a deep architecture that improves expressive power and training stability.
